name: WKSwipeGestureRecognizer
desc: A gesture recognizer that interprets swiping gestures in one or more directions.

items.name: var direction: WKSwipeGestureRecognizerDirection
items.desc: The permitted directions of the swipe.

items.name: struct WKSwipeGestureRecognizerDirection
items.desc: Constants indicating the direction of a swipe.
